channel.title: #Powerdns on Metricly Docs
channel.description: Recent content in #Powerdns on Metricly Docs

item.title: PowerDNS
item.description: Prerequisites Linux Agent Configure You cannot activate the PowerDNS integration until Metricly begins receiving data. Once data arrives, the package (Dashboards and Policies) is automatically provisioned. To remove those Dashboards and Policies, click the toggle on the PowerDNS integration card. 1. Get API Key In Metricly, Navigate to Integrations > PowerDNS. Copy the API Key. Add this key to your Linux Agent. 2. Update the Configuration File Open PowerDNSCollector.
